fields.name: cities

fields.label: Latitude
fields.name: lat
fields.description: The latitude in degrees to mark on the map for this city.

fields.label: Longitude

fields.description: The longitude in degrees to mark on the map for this city.

fields.name: team
fields.label: Team
fields.description: Drag to reorder the team members. The person at the top will display first.

fields.label: The main image to display at the top of the article.

fields.description: The institution the authors are from.
